creator: Educa Studio
descriptionHtml:
Toilet training is the process in which kids learn to take a pee and poop in the toilet like the adult. In this step kids are trained not to have a pee or poop in their diapers. Marbel Toilet Training provide assistance for the parents in educating their kids on their best time to start to do it on their own.

SPECIAL FEATURES
# Simulation games designed according to the real condition including from the very beginning step of how kids recognize the need to pee or poop along with the causal consequences up to the process themselves.

# Perspective design of different activities specified for boys and girls.
# Clear and brief voice guide in every learning process.
# Cute Illustrations and animations to attract kids' attention in learning.

SHARE WITH US
Lets share your experiences in learning while playing through social media and links provided bellow. Visit our social media to get your game and many other useful information around kids education:
# Facebook: https://facebook.com/educastudio
# Email: support@educastudio.com
# Instagram: @educastudio
descriptionShort: ★★★★★ The easy way to train kids in using the toilet for the first time
